Myrmidon just laughed as Malice fled the scene. "Idiot!" Myrmidon's
deep voice boomed, "He thought we would be easy picking!" Myrmidon
looked around for a moment as he allowed his wounds to close and begin
the stages of healing. "The battle is not over, the prey is on the
run!"

Myrmidon shifted form, looking much like a large well armored bull with
wicked looking spikes protruding from it and stout horns from its head.
"Perceptor!" Myrmidon's voice seemed to have only gotten deeper with
the transformation, "Open the doors between me and him. He is MINE!"

((OOC: Myrmidon is unaware that Malice has entered the ducts))

Preston
(Myrmidon)
